column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Mouthwatering and unique drinks and food
column2: such a great fun atmosphere inside and out
column3: and excellent servers with great drink and menu recommendations! The whole venue is gorgeous gorgeous
column4: great for families and friend get togethers
column7: or just watching a game; I loved that there seems to be something for everyone at Bosscat. And I love the restrooms
column8: especially the BumbleDate plaque informing how to get support from the staff if someone is on an uncomfortable date. That was so great to see and I hope more and more businesses start following suit. I'll definitely be coming back here!
